activitybar.kiuwan.title: Kiuwan Defects
activitybar.coverage.title: Coverage Defects
command.checkConnection: K4D: Check Connection With Current Settings
configuration.connectionSettings.baseSer: Customize Kiuwan server location (use for on-premise distributions).
configuration.connectionSettings.credent: Your Kiuwan account's password. You can type it here directly, or use 'K4D: Enter and Encrypt Password' command to store it securely.
If your organization has configured Kiuwan to use SSO, you can set up here too by introducing the Domain ID.
configuration.connectionSettings.remoteA: The Kiuwan application that will be linked to this workspace.
configuration.connectionSettings.area: The jenkins area that will be linked to this workspace.
configuration.connectionSettings.jobName: The jenkins job name that will be linked to this workspace.
configuration.connectionSettings.buildNu: The jenkins build number that will be linked to this workspace.
configuration.defectsList.analysisSource: Choose what type of analysis of the associated remote application you want to synchronize.
You'll need to specify action plan's name in corresponding field. Tip: use 'K4D: Pick Action Plan' command to assist you.
You'll need to specify audit delivery's code in corresponding field. Tip: use 'K4D: Pick Audit Delivery' command to assist you.
You'll need to specify delivery's code in corresponding field. Tip: use 'K4D: Pick Delivery' command to assist you.
Type the name of an existing action plan for the chosen remote application.
Type the code of an existing audit delivery for the chosen remote application.
This range will be used by the 'K4D: Pick Audit Delivery' command to limit the results retrieved from the server.
Type the code of an existing delivery for the chosen remote application.
This range will be used by the 'K4D: Pick Delivery' command to limit the results retrieved from the server.
configuration.defectsList.defectsLimit: Limit number of defects retrived from Kiuwan (value equal to or less than zero means no limit).
configuration.defectsList.filters.byChar: Comma-separated list of characteristics (Efficiency, Maintainability, Portability, Reliability, Security) to retrieve from server (leave blank for all).
configuration.defectsList.filters.byFile: File path contains the following substring.
configuration.defectsList.filters.byLang: Comma-separated list of languages (for a full list of languages available see online documentation) to retrieve from server (leave blank for all).
configuration.defectsList.filters.byPrio: Comma-separated list of priorities (Very high, High, Normal, Low, Very low) to retrieve from server (leave blank for all).
configuration.defectsList.order.by: Choose a criteria to order defects retrieved.
